moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Suki
characters.description: Kyoshi warrior, proud feminist, will destroy you while calling you a sissy

moves.name: Fan Dance
moves.description: Suki performs a combative dance with her Kyoshi Warrior fan

moves.name: Makeup Blast
moves.description: Suki paints her opponent's face like a Kyoshi Warrior's, making them embarrassed

moves.name: Paper Cranes
moves.description: Suki uses her fans to create paper cranes that attack her opponent

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: Suki engages in close combat and throws a series of punches and kicks

new moves.name: Fan Dance
new moves.description: Aang imitates a Kyoshi warrior, performing a combative dance to fight his enemy
